name: Card Game Template with Google Sheets Sync
description:
v1.0

A workflow to design and generate cards from data in Google Sheets. Great for rapid iteration and print-and-play prototyping.

Full tutorial: https://diegeticgames.com/blog/2020/03/04/using-figma-for-card-game-prototyping.html

Based on a workflow developed by Raph D'Amico
